attributes.review: I got the app cause I wanted to keep up to what trump was with the election and stuff! I didn’t like the app it made my phone incredibly slow and was glitchy I don’t recommend it! If you want to keep up just go online and see what’s up and read articles! I used to be a trump supporter when I wanted the app but now I’m a little more educated! Strongly suggest online articles
attributes.title: I used to support trump 🖕

attributes.review: Never uninstalled an app so fast, my mom got the app and it completely glitched her phone and kept kicking her off but of course she didn’t know it was the app cause she’s older. I downloaded the app to see if it was the problem and it was!! Needs to go asap before it gives more and more phones problems,  just like he did the United States be smart don’t vote for trump :)
attributes.title: Disappointing :(

attributes.review:
i swear to god i was showing my goldfish this “cool” new app 
cant remember the name of it something like dump2020 idk. but when the photo of the orange man with plastic surgery came on the screen, regina phalange imploded! i showed it to my other fish and the same thing happened...
how could this be?!
WHY MUST THE GOOD DIE YOUNG?!
Don’t download this app, i dont even want to think about what would happen if you showed it to your cat, dog or even to a baby 😳
attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY FISH

attributes.review: when downloading this app i was thinking that i would be able to be better informed about what is happening in the world currently. Upon first opening this app my eyes were burning at the sight of a soggy cheeto man in a blue suit and a red tie. my eye balls ran away and i was left there without sight. my phone fell out of my hands to the bottom of the earth and shattered.
attributes.title: i was scared for my life and my eye balls are no longer working ✊😔

attributes.review: I didn’t know that the person around this app is a clown I’m also a freaking racist homophobic The clown be hating Mexicans native Americans Muslims Asians Black and the orange also wants to delete TikTok didn’t believe that police brutality is a thing I have so much hate for aClown named Donald J Trump but let’s get this app to a one star rating because then don’t delete the app because you’re deleting every app that is one star rateLet’s do it
attributes.title: I hate it

attributes.review: this app is scary... i opened the app and right away i saw ROACHES just crawling all over my screen and that kinda freaked me out. Next i clicked to see the home page and it was CALLING ME NAMES, VERY BAD ONES. next a video of so called “Peaches” showed up and the video contained graphic photos that i would rather never see again. That video just about gave me a heart attack!! i would never recommend this app to anyone!!
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: I genuinely don’t think I’ve ever used a worse app in my life. The ui is convoluted and confusing. It’s impossible to find any important information. Links almost never work on this app. I wish I could give this god awful app less the one star because that is what it truly deserves. Whoever designed this app is scum of the earth, and I hope they never design another app.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: i opened the app because i wanted to support the, racist, homophobic, disgusting and also perverted orange potato. but yet i got lunched to the moon, came back and everything was veryyyy wobbly. i assumed it was because of all the Tylenol i drank an hour before, but no. it was the person who i opened the app to. THE RACIST HOMOPHOBIC DISGUSTING AND PERVERTED ORANGE POTATO!!!!! i was S H O C K E D. i didn’t expect the “app” to have such an impact on me. i give this a 1 out of 10. disgusting and put me in a very emotional state of mind 😔 🇺🇸Anonymous 2020 🇺🇸
attributes.title: 🤡✨TikTok ✨🤡

attributes.review:
I would give it a zero star review if I could but I can’t. When I first opened the app, Donald trump jumped out of my phone and yelled “TRUMP 2020”. I am a loyal trump supporter/republican so I tried to shake his hand. He then slapped me on the face and took out a knife. He chased me around my house trying to kill me!! He caught me in the end but I used my super cool karate skills to disarm him and kill him. I then said, “Trump 2020✨🌸🦄💘🧚🏼‍♂️ but on a grave💞💖🧚🏻‍♀️✨”

Its such a bad app
attributes.title: This app is not good

attributes.review: as a very large trump fan i downloaded this hoping to get more reasons to love him. but when i downloaded it. this big scary man w his toupee and orange skin was there 😱 and as i was scrolling i started smelling this awful smell and it was coming from this app. i closed out to see if it was just this app and it was!!! i also don’t like it because the person who this app belongs to likes to make sexual remarks about minors.
attributes.title: STINKY
